{{ddcl|header=chrono|since=c++20|
class year;
}}

The class {{tt|year}} represents a year in the {{enwiki|proleptic Gregorian calendar}}. Its range is {{closed range plain|-32767|32767}}.

{{tt|year}} is a {{named req|TriviallyCopyable}} {{named req|StandardLayoutType}}.
